T01n885u_001:2: ye jinapūrvakāye bhavanti ye ca dhriyanti daśadiśi loke |
T01n885u_001:3: tān hi jināṃśca karomi praṇāmaṃ taṃ jinasaṃghamahaṃ prabhijaṣye || 1 ||
T01n885u_001:33: sūkṣmarajopama ye ca bhavanti sūkṣmarajopama ye tiṣṭhanti || 16 ||
T01n885u_001:34: tāṃśca jinān prakaromi praṇāmaṃ kāyena vācā manasā prasannā |
T01n885u_001:37: ye ca sunirvṛtasādhujinānāṃ sā ca lalāṭa vicitra anekaiḥ || 18 ||
T01n885u_001:38: ekajinasya guṇān nahi śakyo jihvasahasreṇa bhāṣitu kiṃcit |
T01n885u_001:39: kāmamaśakti hi sarvajinānāṃ ekaguṇasya hi vistaravaktum || 19 ||
T01n885u_001:41: ye jalagrahaṇatu śakyapramāṇaṃ naiva tu ekaguṇā sugatāntam || 20 ||
T01n885u_001:43: prameya saṃcita puṇyaphalāgraṃ tena ca sattva prabhotu jinatvam || 21 ||
T01n885u_001:44: eva tu viśvaṃ narapatibuddhaṃ eva karomi nṛpaḥpraṇidhānam |
T01n885u_001:45: yatra ca kutra ci mabhyabhaveta jāti anāgata kalpamanantā || 22 ||
T01n885u_001:46: īdṛśabherī paśyami svapne īdṛśanādaṃ tatra śṛṇomi |
T01n885u_001:47: īdṛśa jinastuti kamalākareṇa jāti jarāsmara tatra labheyam || 23 ||
T01n885u_001:48: buddhaguṇāni anantamatulyaṃ ye'pi ca durlabha kalpasahasram |
T01n885u_001:49: anuśruta ye ca svapnagate'pi teṣu ca deśayi divasagato'pi || 24 ||
T01n885u_001:50: duḥkhasamudra vimocayi sattvā pūrayi ṣaḍabhiḥ pāramitābhiḥ |
T01n885u_001:53: saṃmukhapaśyami śākyamunīndraṃ vyākaraṇaṃ hyahu tatra labheyam || 26 ||
T01n885u_001:54: yau ima dārakadvau mama putrau kanakendra kanakaprabhāśvarau |
T01n885u_001:55: tau ubhi dāraka tatra labheyaṃ bodhimanuttaravyākaraṇaṃ ca || 27 ||
T01n885u_001:56: ye pi ca sattva anekamanantā śaraṇavihīnā vyasanagatāśca |
T01n885u_001:59: kalpa anāgata bodhi careyaṃ yattahu pūrvaṃ koṭi gatāśca || 29 ||
T01n885u_001:61: karmasamudra vikīryatu mahyaṃ kleśasamudra vichidyatu mahyam || 30 ||
T01n885u_001:62: puṇyasamudraṃ pūryatu mahyaṃ jñānasamudra viśodhyatu mahyam |
T01n885u_001:63: vimalajñāna prabhāsavareṇa kāma prabhā ca bhaviṣyatu mahyam || 31 ||
T01n885u_001:64: puṇyaprabhāsa vilocanatā ca sarvatriloki viśiṣṭa bhaveyam |
T01n885u_001:65: puṇyavareṇa samanvita nityaṃ duḥkhasamudra uttārayitā ca || 32 ||
T01n885u_001:66: sarvasukhasya ca sāgarakalpaṃ kalpamanāgata bodhi careyam |
